column2: Alta Equipment Group Inc., formerly B. Riley Principal Merger Corp., is a provider of industrial and construction equipment and related services. The Company owns and operates integrated equipment dealership platforms in the United States. Through its branch network, the Company sells, rents, and provides parts and service support for specialized equipment, including lift trucks and aerial work platforms, cranes, earthmoving equipment and other industrial and construction equipment. The Company operates in locations such as Michigan, Illinois, Indiana, New England, New York and Florida.
